-- | The ToString class
--   
--   A type class for converting text types to String.
@package tostring
@version 0.2.1.1

module Data.String.ToString
class ToString a
toString :: ToString a => a -> String
instance ToString s => ToString (CI s)
instance ToString Text
instance ToString Text
instance ToString ByteString
instance ToString ByteString
instance ToString String
